text.text:
Manufacturer: Atari, Inc., Atari Corporation
Released: 1979
OS: Atari OS
CPU: 8-bit MOS Technology 6502B @ 1.8 MHz
RAM: 8 KB base, 48 KB max.
ROM: 8 KB (Atari BASIC)
Resolution: 320×192 pixels, monochrome / 160×96 pixels, 128 colors
Sound: 4 x oscillators with noise mixing
